DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective investigate whether multiple-dose administration eslicarbazepine acetate affect pharmacokinetics metformin .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Eslicarbazepine Acetate Pharmacokinetics Metformin Healthy Volunteers
